item.title: Aukey's MagFusion Ark Brings 25W Qi2.2 Charging With Detachable Power Bank Spheres
item.description: Aukey today introduced the MagFusion Ark, a modular wireless charger that supports the faster Qi2.2 specification. The MagFusion Ark can charge an iPhone at up to 25W, matching the speed of Apple’s Ma
